changeSet.sql: UPDATE hiv_art_pharmacy SET ipt = jsonb_set( jsonb_set(ipt, '{dateCompleted}', '""'::jsonb), '{completionStatus}', '""'::jsonb ) WHERE ipt->>'dateCompleted' IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(ipt->>'dateCompleted') != '' AND LOWER(TRIM(ipt->>'dateCompleted')) NOT LIKE '%null%' AND ipt->>'dateCompleted' !~ '^\s+$' AND TRIM(ipt->>'dateCompleted') ~ '^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$' AND CAST(TRIM(ipt->>'dateCompleted') AS DATE) > CURRENT_DATE;
